original_title: เกม / ล่า / ตาย
overview: In the online social world Games are one of the things that people like to play for entertainment and more. Is the world of earning money "Mess", a young man who lives with his sister try to push yourself in every possible way. To survive and find a risk for yourself and your siblings by using skills and brains one day sister. His seriously ill So he had to earn money to heal. So he joins forces with his friends Pete and Praih. Together play games online Until getting more and more rewards but with Meth's greed. Thus causing the relationship to begin to split his need for more money the enthusiasm that has become. Greed is about to turn into evil. Causing Meth to make decisions in order to move past that point. With your own conscience otherwise, he might lose his only sister forever.
title: Bad Social
